mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, account, user_password, sex, age, birthday, email, ip, lat, lng, create_user_name, create_user_id, create_time, update_user_name, update_user_id, update_time, phone, state, head_img_url, is_deleted, version, remarks
mapper.select:

where ${where}
order by

create_time desc
mapper.update: update tbl_user set is_deleted=2 where user_id in ($(userIds))
